解釋下咩係injective surjective

一個function f:A->B有domain A同image B
如果A任何兩個唔一樣嘅element a_1, a_2, apply f後仍然係唔一樣嘅話（即係f(a_1)唔等於f(a_2)），咁f就係injective

如果B任何一個element都可以寫做f(某啲嘢)嘅話，f就surjective

解釋下咩係injective surjective

injective: 唔會有y對應多個x

injective: f(x)=x
not injective: f(x)=x^2; (1=f(1)=f(-1))

surjective: 所有y都有其對應既x
surjective: f(x)=x
not surjective: f(x)=x^2; (f(x)=-1 -> error )

PS:以上例子都係講緊f:R->R

convolution 我答到
係signal and system 野
係大自然信號入面有分continuesly 同discrete time
convolution 係當一個信號打入一個系統既時候
個信號同系統會有咩變化
而個變化有個名係impulse response
continuesly 既convolution 係積分黎
又負無限in到無限 亦姐係用Fourier transform
(laplace transform 又0 in到無限)
discrete time 既convolution 係加數

Idea上，
dy/dx可以睇成(small in y change) / (small x change)

Given a cubic equation f(x), 如果 f(x) 嘅所有turning points 都 above x-axis ，咁我係咪就可以話 f(x) has only one real root ?

Yes.
Proof:
If two turning points, consider table of f'(x),
Suppose (another case similar)
for x<a, f'<0, decreasing to f(a)>0
for a<x<b, f'>0, increasing to f(b)>0
for b<x, f'<0, decreasing to -infinity
the root will be in (b,+inf)

If one turning point, f'(x)=0 has 2 repeated real roots, f(x)=0 has 3 repeated real root.

If no turning point, f'(x)=0 has no real roots. f(x) is injective.

thus f(x)>=f(0)=1 for all x
The claim has been proved.

我見過既做法係咁
Let e=empty set
0=empty set
1={0}, then 1 =/= 0
2={0,1}, then 2=/=0 and 2=/=1
如此類推，重點係去定義出互不相同既element，
而呢堆element組成既set就叫natural number N
然後定義successor，定義加法，用peano axiom既定義去approach
成個證明大部份都係定義
